latest_revision.text:
We can use this page to brainstorm and research various methods of marketing to get our image out to the local community.

=Idea Brainstorming=
* Put everything up and change things constantly, let people see the size and progress.  CONSTANT BETA!
* Blogging, stuff that is local, provide some sort of benefit to bring people there so you can sell them on the space, like a local hackaday
* Ignite phoenix would be huge for us
* What about handing out free daypasses somewhere, colleges etc?
* What about an open house day once a month where we throw the doors open?
* Classes and outreach to schools will be key
* First Friday!
* Flashmobbing

=Links=

Free Google Ads for Non-Profits(Waiting on Tax-Exempt Status):
* http://www.google.com/grants/


=Materials=
Vinyl Scrim Banner [http://3monkeyspad.com/orders_templates.html $6 per sq ft full color] -- I think this would be preferred to canvas?
